heading: creating, listening, dancing
intro: i curate and weave tracks together — from acid techno to hip hop and jazz — mostly for myself to enjoy, and sometimes at friends' parties.

artists.title: sonia calico
artists.desc: taiwanese dj/producer. experimental club, deconstructed, relentless energy.

artists.title: acid pauli
artists.desc: psychedelic electronic music. organic, deeply textured, impossible to sit still to.

artists.title: nils frahm
artists.desc: intimate piano with electronic textures, ambient techno-influenced soundscapes.

movies.title: sense8
movies.desc: eight strangers across the world share consciousness.

movies.title: everything everywhere all at once
movies.desc: multiverse absurdism that becomes the most moving film about love and laundry.

movies.title: altered carbon
movies.desc: consciousness is software, bodies are hardware, and immortality breaks society in ways that feel inevitable. cyberpunk noir at its most philosophical.

games.title: hanabi
games.desc: cooperative card game where you can see everyone's hand but your own. pure coordination problem.

games.title: secret hitler
games.desc: watching your friends lie to your face is a great way to build trust.
